--- Mike Duffy <mike.duffy@...> wrote:
> 
> We have a public API running on a Java application server which we
> are hitting through JSP pages.  We would like to hit
> the methods of the public API directly in some sort of multi-threaded
> heavy load stress simulation.
> 
> Does anyone have any suggestions? 
> 

You can use the LoadTest test decorator included in JUnitPerf to
simulate multiple, concurrent users and iterations...

   http://www.clarkware.com/software/JUnitPerf.html

There are various other choices if you're in the market for
commercial-grade load testing tools.

Mike
